segments.text: Daniel , have you finished your homework ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet , Dad . I am watching Ultraman instead.No , no , Dad . Please . This program is on only once a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Daniel , as a matter of fact , TV is bad for your health .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's full of violence and you are so young .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But there are cartoons on TV . Bees , big trees , seas , and a lot of other interesting things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's homework time now . Go and do your homework and then go to bed.American Idol , There you go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dad , it's not fair . I am so disappointed with you !
segments.speaker: S2
